title: Understanding the Information Cycle
text: When a scientific study is published, it goes through an information cycle. Initially, it might be reported in news outlets, but detailed analyses are usually found in academic journals.

title: Where to Find In-depth Analysis
text: By Friday, a detailed analysis of a study published on Monday is likely to be found in sources that provide comprehensive reviews, such as academic journals.

title: Identifying the Right Source
text: Which source is known for providing detailed and peer-reviewed analyses of scientific studies?
